short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Twitter experience by seamlessly integrating emoji reactions directly into your Twitter timeline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avokado is a must-have Chrome extension that brings a delightful enhancement to your Twitter experience. With Avokado installed, you gain the ability to react to Twitter tweets with emojis directly within the same Twitter page, making your interactions more engaging and expressive.

By simply adding Avokado to your browser, a sleek and user-friendly emoji reaction toolbar appears alongside each tweet in your Twitter timeline. This toolbar offers a wide range of expressive emojis, enabling you to effortlessly convey your emotions and thoughts about a tweet with a single click. Whether you want to express joy, laughter, surprise, love, or any other sentiment, Avokado's extensive emoji library ensures you'll find the perfect reaction for every tweet.
